Super app launcher. Very reliable in the couple of months I've been using it. For me, this app replaces the Sony app launcher missing in the latest version of Android where all the bespoke Sony apps such as Contacts, Phone, Messages, have all disappeared, and instead have been replaced by their Google Android equivalents. This simple app launcher is closest in style and function I could find to the old Sony app launcher.

google_play_reviews.content: Very simple, clean, fast and no advertisements (so far) The needs that this app satisfied were unconventional. Samsung allows any app to be opened in a popout window using the built-in methods. When playing games, they give you 4 shortcuts to attach to apps in order to pop out the window over the game. With this app, I'm no longer limited to 4 shortcuts. The clean ui, simplicity and free of intrusive adds, makes this perfect for what I needed. Thank you for this app.

google_play_reviews.content: Hey devs, you have an amazing app on your hands if only I could suggest one thing. The ability to create an app drawer in this one. very effective and simple app launcher among all I have downloaded. Mi and 
some other phone don't app drawer, in this case this app is more useful. I 
will be very happy if this app launcher icon would customisable, then we 
could use customise icon to match with other icon.

I love the fact that all these apps are free of ads. There is no nagging to 
rate the apps either. I am 61 and I am thoroughly impressed with people 
that can make apps that do all the things they do. He is putting in a lot 
of long hard work on these things since he does this all by himself. I went 
to PayPal and sent him $10 dollars of gratefulness for no ads and no 
constant reminders to rate me. All the different apps he's created are 
worth $10. I would have given more if I could have.
